wikipedia_page.main: Nick Bell (born 5 September 1950) is a British fencer. He competed at the 1976 and 1984 Summer Olympics. He latter went to the 1999 World Championships at 49 years old, after two years earlier taking up epee. A return to foil in 2004 lead to him winning that year's Welsh open.
